features: 4-IN-1 CELL PHONE STAND WITH BLUETOOTH SPEAKER & WIRELESS CHARGING: This versatile device combines a wireless Bluetooth speaker, wireless charging, phone holder, and a built-in microphone. It offers hands-free convenience for video watching and phone calls, along with wireless charging capability while you watch. The upgraded Bluetooth speaker also features a USB output for emergency charging, catering to phones that do not support wireless charging.

CERTIFIED DUAL SUPER-CONDUCTOR COILS FOR WIDER CHARGING: Thanks to dual super-conductor coils, you can enjoy seamless charging while watching landscape videos or making calls in portrait mode, all without power interruptions. Wireless Charging & Bluetooth Speaker Phone Stand also incorporates safety features such as over-current protection, over-voltage protection, over-temperature protection, and foreign object detection to ensure secure charging and prevent battery overcharge damage.

EXPERIENCE EXCEPTIONAL SOUND: Our Bluetooth V5.1 Speakers feature robust 5W (up to 10W) full-range drivers for stunning stereo sound, deep bass, crystal clarity, and zero distortion. With the latest Bluetooth 5.1 technology, it offers lower power consumption, faster transmission, and stable signal with no delays. It's compatible with multiple devices and includes a built-in microphone for easy call handling.

FOLDABLE & PORTABLE PHONE STAND: Adjustable Angle Phone Holder, Tailored for Your Various Viewing Needs. Go hands-free and enjoy games, videos, and FaceTime with the flexibility of customizing multiple angles. The non-slip rubber pad keeps your device securely in place, preventing unintended slips.

UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY: This iphone stand works with most 4-13" Smartphones Tablets and e-readers, including iPhone models (15Pro/15Plus/15Pro Max/14 Pro/14 Plus/14/13 Pro Max/13 Pro/13/12 Pro Max/12 Pro/11/Xs Max/Xs/XR/X/8/7/6/6s/SE), Galaxy series (S23 Ultra/S9/S9 Plus/S8/S7/S6/Note9/Note8), LG, iPad mini, Samsung Tab, Google Nexus, Kindle, and more.

COOL GADGET & PERFECT GIFTS: Whether you're using it at home, in the kitchen, or outdoors, this stand frees your hands and makes an excellent gift for men, women, dads, moms, boyfriends, and anyone you care about. It's an ideal choice for Christmas, Thanksgiving,Father's Day, birthdays, spa/bath gifts, or special occasions, making it a perfect gift for the important women in your life like mom, wife, girlfriend, or anyone you cherish.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Supporting up to 15W wireless fast charging, just place your Qi-enabled device on the phone stand. Bringing you the ultimate audio experience. The built-in microphone offers high-quality and convenient hands-free calling. The USB port can provide emergency charging for your phone. Next page 1 Wireless Charging 2 HD Sound Quality 3 Built-in Microphone 4 USB charging

How to connect a device to the cell phone stand with speaker? To connect a device to the Bluetooth speaker, please enable Bluetooth on your device and search for available Bluetooth devices. Select ""F21"" from the list of available devices, and then complete the pairing process. How do I use wireless charging? Ensure your phone supports wireless charging. Plug the adapter into the stand's port; the left light briefly turns green and blue, then off. Align your phone with the panel; the light stays blue, indicating successful charging. How to clear pairing? 1.Go to your device's Bluetooth settings. 2.Find the "F21" device in the list of paired devices. 3.Tap "F21" and choose "Forget" or "Unpair." 4.Your device is now disconnected from "F21. What phones is the wireless charging feature compatible with? The wireless charging feature is compatible with phones that inherently support wireless charging, whether they are Apple or Android devices. What's inside the box? 1 x Phone Stand with Bluetooth Speaker and wireless charger - 1 x Type-C Charging Cable - 1 x User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome sound, quality built, and easy to connect via bluetooth on any phones (IOS or Android)
reviews.reviewText: This phone holder has great sound clarity, and very easy to your phones or tablets (IOS or android). The holder can hold almost any sizes of phones and/or tablets available in the market.The unit is so portable and convenient to have around the house, especially, while you are cooking in the kitchen or taking a nap. I use this unit at night with relaxing music which put me to sleep very quickly due to the sound clarity. The phone holder arm is adjustable so you can adjust to any angles as you desiredThe holder has an option to charge your phone wirelessly (if your phone comes with this wireless charge feature) just use your existing charging cable. The holder also comes with the micro SD card reader so you can independently listen to the music that stored on your micro SD card. There is also a volume control on the unit. It is pretty loud if you actually adjust to the Max level.I would recommend this unit. This is a great holiday give as you can put it to you immediately while opening up the Xmas give under the Xmas tree.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Ultimate Gadget – A Gift That Keeps on Giving!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I gotta say, I stumbled upon this 4-IN-1 CELL PHONE STAND WITH BLUETOOTH SPEAKER & WIRELESS CHARGING, and let me tell ya, it's like the Swiss Army knife of gadgets. This thingamajig is more than just a gift; it's a game-changer, a mood-lifter, and a lifesaver all rolled into one.First things first, the design is off the charts. I mean, who wouldn't want a gadget that's a Bluetooth speaker, wireless charger, phone holder, AND has a built-in microphone? It's like the Avengers assembled in the form of a device. I gifted it to my buddy for his birthday, and let me tell ya, he was filled with happiness and surprise. I think he might've shed a tear or two.Let's talk about these dual super-conductor coils. I don't know much about science, but all I can say is that charging your phone while watching videos is like magic. No interruptions, no hiccups – just seamless charging. And don't get me started on the safety features; it's like having a personal bodyguard for your phone. Over-current, over-voltage, over-temperature – this thing's got it all covered.Now, the sound. Oh boy, the sound! These Bluetooth V5.1 Speakers are like having a mini concert in your pocket. The stereo sound is so stunning; I felt like I was in a Hollywood blockbuster. And with the latest Bluetooth tech, it's like the device is psychic – no delays, no drama, just pure musical bliss.The foldable and portable design is a stroke of genius. I can set it up at any angle for my various viewing needs, whether I'm gaming, watching videos, or having a serious FaceTime session. And that non-slip rubber pad? It's like a superhero cape, keeping my phone safe and sound.Compatibility is a breeze. I've got an iPhone, my cousin's got a Galaxy, and my grandma rocks an ancient Kindle – this stand caters to everyone. It's like the United Nations of phone accessories. I can't believe how universal it is.So there you have it – the 4-IN-1 CELL PHONE STAND WITH BLUETOOTH SPEAKER & WIRELESS CHARGING is the gift of the century. If you're looking to make someone's day, this is the way to go. Thanksgiving, Christmas, Birthdays, Valentine's Day – heck, I might even give it for Arbor Day because it's just that awesome. Get one, and thank me later!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and worthwhile
reviews.reviewText: This device is quite handy, portable, and versatile. The bluetooth connection to my phone worked right away and I was able to play music which comes through clearly in the speaker. The fully-adjustable tilting platform also serves as a phone holder while working at the desk. The wireless charging also worked ok and while it didn't do fast-charging, it's still beneficial to have an all-in-one device like this sitting either at the desk or the bedside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plenty of features for a reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: An absolute delight! Its sleek design and versatile features makes it a super useful gadget to have at home. It has a nice sound quality and the handy phone stand and wireless charging pad is very helpful and convenient.And works perfect with iphone and android!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use and Compact Multi-Purpose Bluetooth Speaker
reviews.reviewText: This is a clever device that combines Bluetooth speaker, wireless phone charger, and phone stand into one small, desk-sized package. The phone stand component extends, swivels, and angles - in addition to having a ledge to keep your phone from slipping. While your phone is in the stand, you can optionally wirelessly charge from the stand itself. All of this would be useful on its own but this device also adds a Bluetooth speaker that provides clear sound quality, great for any home office or other home room. This is a great device for the value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Versatile Delight for Tech Enthusiasts!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the MepvabKY Bluetooth Speaker with Wireless Charging & Phone Stand, and it has quickly become one of my favorite tech gadgets! This product is an absolute game-changer for anyone who loves innovative and multifunctional devices.The Bluetooth speaker delivers exceptional sound quality, providing a rich and immersive audio experience. I was pleasantly surprised by the depth of bass and clarity of the highs, making it perfect for both casual music listening and enhancing movie nights. The wireless connectivity is seamless, and it effortlessly pairs with a variety of devices, including iPhones, Samsung phones, and iPads.One of the standout features of this speaker is its built-in wireless charging capability. It's incredibly convenient to have a dedicated spot to charge my device without dealing with tangled cords. The added phone stand is a thoughtful touch, allowing me to watch videos or keep an eye on notifications while my device is charging.This MepvabKY Bluetooth Speaker makes for an ideal gift, especially during Christmas or birthdays. It's a fantastic choice for tech-savvy individuals who appreciate the perfect blend of functionality and style. The sleek design and durable build quality showcase the attention to detail put into this product.As someone who often struggles to find the right gift for the "men who want nothing," this Bluetooth speaker has proven to be a hit. It's a unique and practical gift that adds a touch of cool tech to any kitchen or entertainment space.
